attributes.action: Stop all MP,s allowances until new rules are put in place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that all mp,s allowances should be put on hold until a fairer means has been put into place and all loopholes are closed. allowances should only be for food or extra travel expensies above the norm

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
